bill_title: authorize the Board of Regents to designate pay periods for the board's payroll system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the Board of Regents to designate pay periods for the board's payroll system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 3-8-6 be amended to read as follows: 3-8-6. The compensation and expenses of all officers and employees, payable out of the state treasury, shall be paid at least once each calendar month, but no officer or employee may be paid in advance for any period of service. The Bureau of Finance and Management shall designate pay periods for all agencies that use the payroll systems utilizing funds from the state treasury. system that the bureau operates. The Board of Regents shall designate pay periods for the payroll system that the board operates. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.04 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
